caption: Figure 2: The trend of mean model accuracy w.r.t mean faithfulness (ROUGE-Lsum) for all the models. Faithfulness is positively correlated with model performance.
description: The chart displays the positive correlation between model accuracy and reasoning faithfulness across different models, categorized into bins based on their ROUGE-Lsum scores.

caption: Figure 3: The figure shows the percentage of executable code per model (right) and the accuracy of the executable code when answering the queries (left).
description: The chart displays the percentage of executable code generated by different LLMs and the accuracy of those executable codes in answering questions for three datasets (AQUA, GSM8k, SQA).

caption: Figure 4: The effect of the model parameter scale from 8B to 100B+ on model accuracy (left) and faithfulness (right).
description: The chart displays the impact of model size (parameter scale) on both accuracy and faithfulness of reasoning for four different language models.

caption: Figure 4: The effect of the model parameter scale from 8B to 100B+ on model accuracy (left) and faithfulness (right).
description: The chart displays the impact of model size (parameter scale) on both accuracy and faithfulness using boxplots comparing four different language models.
